title: Legacy Client not working.
body:
So, pretty much, the legacy client isn't working. I've changed the leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
and still it does not seem to work. I've restarted my PC numerous times yet it still doesn't work. I've also tried to run as administrator but it doesn't do anything. 

In the legacy client, it shows the launch game part but when I click launch, it shows the login screen but then closes instantly.

Any solutions?

replies.body: This issue may not be with the directory, but actually a security setting preventing the client from launching.  Running as admin is a good start, so I suggest you keep going with that by using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  The steps in there should help!
I've done everything there, it still does not open correctly.

That's a bummer, but no worries we can take a closer look.  Grab some logs through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).   We'll help you individually through there.
Oh okay thank you, thank you soo much ;D.

thankfully running as admin worked for me,
the regular beta client is so laggy that i cant play the game without legacy.
